meanings.definition: Routine tasks or duties, especially a household task such as cleaning or laundry.
meanings.sent1: Every Saturday, I do my chores around the house.
meanings.sent2: My mom asked me to help with the chores after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought chasing the broom during chores was a fun game.
meanings.sent4: The mountain of laundry waiting for me felt like a never-ending pile of chores.
meanings.sent5: The smell of clean laundry after finishing my chores was rewarding.

meanings.sent1: Facing the chores of cleaning the attic seemed daunting.
meanings.sent2: The chores of fixing the leaky roof were exhausting.
meanings.sent3: He found a way to make the chores of painting the fence enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The chores of organizing the messy garage felt like a never-ending battle.
meanings.sent5: The weight of the difficult chores on his shoulders was heavy.
